posts.title: President Bola Tinubu
posts.body: Bola Tinubu becomes the president of Nigeria

comments.body: Agbado is now the president of this country
They could not make a down payment for roasted corn

posts.title: Dele Alake CBN speech
posts.body: Dele Alake giving speech about the naira to dollar situation

comments.body: The man is not serious, see Emefiele behind him. A whole CBN governor
He hold no political post. They have turned it to family business

posts.title: Meeting
posts.body:
Had a long hour meeting with Gad where he explained POST, GET, PATCH, PUT AND DELETE. 

We also had a discussion on how the logic of login and signup works
